form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Application for Adjustment of Status to Lawful Permanent Resident (, I-4526

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/18/2023 Block 1. - Information About Alien Beneficiary (Continued) 21. Address in the United States where beneficiary will reside (City) (State) 870 ELmIRA DRIVE SUNNYVALE CALIFORNIA 22. Address at which beneficiary Is presently residing (Apt. No.) (Number and street) (Town or city) (Province or State) (Zip Code, if in U.S.) 870 ELMIRA DRIVE SUNNYVALE CALIFORNIA 94087 23. If beneficiary Is in the United States, give the following Information concerning beneficiary: a. He last arrived In the U.S.on b. He last arrived in U.S. as 1 21 PM '75 c. Show date beneficiary's stay expired or will (Month) (Day) (Year) (Visitor, student, exchange alien, (clewman) stowaway, etc.) expire as shown on his Form 1-94 or I-95: 5-18-75 ViSITOR SAN FRANCISCO 8-18-75 d. Name and address of present employer N/A CALIFORNIA e. Date allen began this employment N/A 24. Check the appropriate box below and furnish the Information required for the box checked: Beneficiary will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in (CITY IN FOREIGN COUNTRY) (FOREIGN COUNTRY) Beneficiary is in the United States and will apply for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident in the office of the Immigration and Naturalization Service at SAN FRANCISCO CALIFORNIA (CITY) (STATE) If the application for adjustment of status is denied, the beneficiary will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in (CITY IN FOREIGN COUNTRY) (FOREIGN COUNTRY) Block 11. - Information About Petitioner 26. Other names used; (including maiden name If married woman) ADVANI GULU TECKCHAND 27. I reside in the United States at (C/O, if appropriate) (Apt.No.) (Number and street) (Town or city) (State): (ZIP Code) 870 ELMIRA DRIVE SUNNYVALE CALIFERNIA 94087 28. Address abroad (if any) (Number and street) (Town or city) (Province) (Country) 29. I was born: (Month) (Day) (Year) In: (Town or city) (State or Province) (Country) 2-22-36 HYDERABAD (SIND) PAKISTAN 30: If you are a citizen of the United States, give the following: a. Citizenship was acquired: (Check one) through birth in the U.S. through parents through naturalization through marriage (1) If acquired through naturalization, give name under which naturalized, number of naturalization certificate, and date and place of naturalization: Gulu TECKCHAND ADVANI - # 9574470 - Sept. 28,1971 SAN FRANCISCO. (2) If acquired through parentage or marriage, have you obtained a certificate of citizenship in your own name based on such acquisition ? - (a) If so, give number of certificate and date and place of issuance: (b) If not, submit evidence of citizenship in accordance with Instruction 4a. (2). b. Have you or any person through whom you claim citizenship ever lost United States citizenship? No If so, attach detailed explanation on separate sheet. 31. If you are a lawful permanent resident alien of the United States, give the following: M/A a. Alien Registration Number: b. Date, place, and means of admission for lawful permanent residence A c. Have you ever lost status as a lawful permanent resident allen? If so, explain: (If you are married to a citizen of the United States, read Instruction 1b carefully) 32. Have you attached all required documents (see Instruction No. 4) ? Yes Block I 11. Oath or Affirmation of Petitioner Sania CAROL NOTARY PUBLIC BUTLER ANN I swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this petition signed by me and that the statements herein are true and correct, Signature of petitioner (See Instruction No. 6) Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this N16 day of seps A.D. 19g 75 at Guly Teckchand and My commission Clara expires County, Mar.
